title: The Orville
summary: The Orville is an American science fiction comedy-drama[1][2][3] television series created by and starring Seth MacFarlane as series protagonist Ed Mercer, an officer in the Planetary Union's line of exploratory space vessels in the 25th century. The show, which is inspired by several science-fiction sources, but mainly the original Star Trek as well as its Next Generation successor (both of which it heavily parodies and pays homage to), follows the crew of the starship USS Orville on their episodic adventures.[5][6]
